solver.search.loop.lns

Class LNSFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.search.loop.lns.LNSFactory

  • public class LNSFactory
extends Object
    A Factory for Large Neighborhood Search, with pre-defined configurations.
    Since:
    04/07/13
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme

    • Method Detail

      • random

        public static INeighbor random(Solver solver,
               IntVar[] vars,
               int level,
               long seed,
               ACounter frcounter)
        Create a random neighborhood
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver concerned
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        level - the number of tries for each size of fragment
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        frcounter - a fast restart counter (can be null)
        Returns:
        a random neighborhood

      • pg

        public static INeighbor pg(Solver solver,
           IntVar[] vars,
           int fgmtSize,
           int listSize,
           long seed,
           ACounter frcounter)
        Create a propagation guided neighborhood
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver concerned
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        fgmtSize - fragment size (evaluated against log value)
        listSize - size of the list
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        frcounter - a fast restart counter (can be null)
        Returns:
        a propagation-guided neighborhood

      • rpg

        public static INeighbor rpg(Solver solver,
            IntVar[] vars,
            int fgmtSize,
            int listSize,
            long seed,
            ACounter frcounter)
        Create a reverse propagation guided neighborhood
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver concerned
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        fgmtSize - the limit size for PG and RPG
        listSize - size of the list
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        frcounter - a fast restart counter (can be null)
        Returns:
        a reverse propagation-guided neighborhood

      • rlns

        public static LargeNeighborhoodSearch rlns(Solver solver,
                           IntVar[] vars,
                           int level,
                           long seed,
                           ACounter frcounter)
        Create a LNS based on a random neighborhood.
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        level - the number of tries for each size of fragment
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        frcounter - a fast restart counter (can be null)
        Returns:
        a Random LNS

      • pglns

        public static LargeNeighborhoodSearch pglns(Solver solver,
                            IntVar[] vars,
                            int fgmtSize,
                            int listSize,
                            int level,
                            long seed,
                            ACounter frcounter)
        Create a PGLNS, based on "Propagation-Guided LNS", Perronn Shaw and Furnon, CP2004.
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        fgmtSize - fragment size (evaluated against log value)
        listSize - size of the list
        level - the number of tries for each size of fragment
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        frcounter - a fast restart counter (can be null)
        Returns:
        a Propagation-Guided LNS

      • elns

        public static LargeNeighborhoodSearch elns(Solver solver,
                           IntVar[] vars,
                           int level,
                           long seed,
                           ACounter fr4exp,
                           ACounter fr4rnd)
        Create a ELNS, an Explanation based LNS
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        level - the number of tries for each size of fragment
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        fr4exp - a fast restart counter (can be null) for explained neighborhoods
        fr4rnd - a fast restart counter (can be null) for random neighborhoods
        Returns:
        an Explanation based LNS

      • pgelns

        public static LargeNeighborhoodSearch pgelns(Solver solver,
                             IntVar[] vars,
                             int level,
                             long seed,
                             int fgmtSize,
                             int listSize,
                             ACounter fr4exp,
                             ACounter fr4rnd)
        Create a combination of PGLNS and ELNS (an Explanation based LNS)
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        level - the number of tries for each size of fragment
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        fgmtSize - fragment size (evaluated against log value)
        listSize - size of the list
        fr4exp - a fast restart counter (can be null) for explained neighborhoods
        fr4rnd - a fast restart counter (can be null) for random neighborhoods
        Returns:
        an Explanation based LNS

      • apgelns

        public static LargeNeighborhoodSearch apgelns(Solver solver,
                              IntVar[] vars,
                              int level,
                              long seed,
                              int fgmtSize,
                              int listSize,
                              ACounter fr4exp,
                              ACounter fr4rnd)
        Create a combination of PGLNS and ELNS (an Explanation based LNS), with adaptive neighborhood selection
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver
        vars - the pool of variables to choose from
        level - the number of tries for each size of fragment
        seed - a seed for the random selection
        fgmtSize - fragment size (evaluated against log value)
        listSize - size of the list
        fr4exp - a fast restart counter (can be null) for explained neighborhoods
        fr4rnd - a fast restart counter (can be null) for random neighborhoods
        Returns:
        an Explanation based LNS
